Promotional Artwork Manager | (EMEA) - Fixed-Term Contract
London, England, United Kingdom
Software and Services

Summary
Apple is where individual imaginations gather together, committing to the values that lead to great work. Every new product we build, service we create, or Apple Store experience we 
deliver is the result of us making each other’s ideas stronger. That happens because every one of us shares a belief that we can make something wonderful and share it with the world, changing lives for the better. It’s the diversity of our people and their thinking that inspires the innovation that runs through everything we do. When we bring everybody in, we can do the best work of our lives. Here, you’ll do more than join something — you’ll add something.

The App Store is the world's largest and most innovative software store, serving hundreds of millions of iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, Vision Pro and Mac customers worldwide.

We have an exciting opportunity for a Promotional Artwork Manager to join the team and support creative content production. We are looking for someone with excellent communication, collaboration and project management skills to join our team on a contract. In this role you will help manage the promotional artwork programme for the App Store.

Description
You will be joining a dynamic digital production environment and will oversee the intake and approval of hundreds of developer assets submitted for promotional use on the App Store every month. The digital assets team is a key partner in the App Store ecosystem, and works closely with cross-functional teams including Design, Editorial, Production and Business Affairs to coordinate and deliver engaging promotions to our customers.

You will be responsible for carrying out the developer asset lifecycle from request through reviews and approvals to handoff and archiving. You will also be responsible for working cross-functionally with teams around the world to help shape plans for the asset management process and tooling enhancements.

Responsibilities
Partner with external App Store developers worldwide to ensure artwork meets Apple’s creative standards and App Store guidelines.
Oversee the full asset management lifecycle, from ingestion, review, and approval to handoff and archiving for large volumes of creative materials.
Own end-to-end production of static and motion assets for iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and Apple TV, spanning always-on and high-profile campaigns.
Manage, screen, and prepare developer-provided artwork for safe internal use, coordinating business and legal approvals as needed.
Partner with global cross-functional teams (editorial, design, production, business management) to deliver engaging, high-quality work on tight deadlines.
Contribute to shaping new tools and systems to improve creative workflows and asset delivery, in collaboration with operations and engineering teams.
Maintain exceptional organisation, attention to detail, and proactive communication across time zones.
Minimum Qualifications
Strong background collaborating with global cross-functional teams across design, editorial, production, and engineering.
Deep understanding of digital asset specifications, design principles, and App Store creative standards.
Skilled in digital asset management systems and creative tools, including Box, Airtable, Adobe Photoshop, and Illustrator.
Excellent project management, organisation, and communication skills, with the ability to meet tight and shifting deadlines.
Preferred Qualifications
Experience coordinating business affairs and legal approvals for creative materials.
Passion for technology, apps, and games, with a strong grasp of Apple platforms and user experience.
Proactive problem-solver who thrives in fast-paced, detail-oriented environments.
Fluency in English. Other languages beneficial.
